attributes.action: UK Government should keep the plans to repeal the Off-payroll IR35 in April 2023
attributes.additional_details: UK Government should keep the plans to repeal the Off-payroll IR35 in April 2023 as originally planned to help self employed professionals especially in the Healthy and Social Care industry, Track Drivers etc continue to work in UK as it will stop them loosing out on work related expenses.
attributes.background: UK Government should keep the plans to repeal the Off-payroll IR35 in April 2023

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625524
